About tour

Walking tour of St. Petersburg is one of our most popular, most popular excursions. In fact, this is a fascinating walking tour with a guide around St. Petersburg, in the very center, in the most beautiful and romantic places of the city. Fresh air, a beautiful city, an interesting story-what could be better!

We tried to include the most beautiful places and the most important sights of St. Petersburg in our excursion-walk. We tried to make this route interesting and dynamic, but the tour route can be changed according to your wishes.
